channel.title: Dwell Time, a transit podcast
channel.description: Join Denis Agar and Rodney Chan in their discussions around transit in Canada. From buses to trains and everything else transit, learn about advocacy happening in Canadian cities and beyond.
channel.itunes:author: Dwell Time Productions
channel.itunes:summary: Join Denis Agar and Rodney Chan in their discussions around transit in Canada. From buses to trains and everything else transit, learn about advocacy happening in Canadian cities and beyond.

item.title: Episode 2 - Reece Martin
item.itunes:title: Episode 2 - Reece Martin
item.itunes:summary:
Nearly every city in the country that doesn't experience rain all winter has been inundated with so much snow and it has brought problems to transit riders especially in Southern Ontario. We're also joined by our guest, Reece Martin of RMTransit, where we discuss the nuances and challenges of building a transit advocacy movement, culture, and education. Plus we also provide the big reveal: what is a "dwell time"?
--- Snow removal and Grand River Transit - https://www.cambridgetoday.ca/local-news/grand-river-transit-working-to-enhance-bus-stop-snow-removal-times-11765595 Slush piling up at Toronto bus stops - https://nowtoronto.com/news/toronto-frustrated-slush-filled-sidewalks/ Broadway Subway detour woes in Vancouver - https://www.instagram.com/p/DUCNt3Oj794/
Reece Martin - https://reecemartin.ca
Bluesky - https://bsky.app/profile/dwelltime.ca

item.title: Episode 1 - Meet Rodney and Denis!
item.itunes:title: Episode 1 - Meet Rodney and Denis!
item.itunes:summary:
It's our first step! Rodney Chan of TriTAG and Denis Agar of Movement have come together to discuss transit advocacy in Canada. Rodney brings up the new Line 6 Finch West LRT that just opened in Toronto and how its shortcomings are bringing transit priority front and centre at city hall.Â
As well, Denis and Rodney have a conversation about how they ended up in the transit planning and urbanism scene plus how they both have contributed to being micro-celebrities on social media.
---
Denis promoting a new bus service for Metro Vancouver - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eltnLcyP8AU [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eltnLcyP8AU&pp=ygURZGVuaXMgdGhlIHBsYW5uZXI%3D] Steve Munro Blog Post on TTC Board discussion on Line 6 Finch West LRT - https://stevemunro.ca/2025/12/10/ttc-board-debates-finch-lrt/ Motion to speed up light rail transit and street cars - https://secure.toronto.ca/council/agenda-item.do?item=2025.MM35.15 Results of the motion - https://bsky.app/profile/graphicmatt.com/post/3ma4xkekyhk2o
Tri-Cities Transport Action Group (TriTAG) - https://tritag.ca Movement: Metro Vancouver Transit Riders - https://movementyvr.ca/
Bluesky - https://bsky.app/profile/dwelltime.ca
item.itunes:author: Tamarack & Heather
item.description:
It's our first step! Rodney Chan of TriTAG and Denis Agar of Movement have come together to discuss transit advocacy in Canada. Rodney brings up the new Line 6 Finch West LRT that just opened in Toronto and how its shortcomings are bringing transit priority front and centre at city hall. 

As well, Denis and Rodney have a conversation about how they ended up in the transit planning and urbanism scene plus how they both have contributed to being micro-celebrities on social media.

---

Denis promoting a new bus service for Metro Vancouver - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eltnLcyP8AU
Steve Munro Blog Post on TTC Board discussion on Line 6 Finch West LRT - https://stevemunro.ca/2025/12/10/ttc-board-debates-finch-lrt/
Motion to speed up light rail transit and street cars - https://secure.toronto.ca/council/agenda-item.do?item=2025.MM35.15
Results of the motion - https://bsky.app/profile/graphicmatt.com/post/3ma4xkekyhk2o

Tri-Cities Transport Action Group (TriTAG) - https://tritag.ca
Movement: Metro Vancouver Transit Riders - https://movementyvr.ca/

Bluesky - https://bsky.app/profile/dwelltime.ca
item.content:encoded:
It's our first step! Rodney Chan of TriTAG and Denis Agar of Movement have come together to discuss transit advocacy in Canada. Rodney brings up the new Line 6 Finch West LRT that just opened in Toronto and how its shortcomings are bringing transit priority front and centre at city hall. 

As well, Denis and Rodney have a conversation about how they ended up in the transit planning and urbanism scene plus how they both have contributed to being micro-celebrities on social media.

---

Denis promoting a new bus service for Metro Vancouver - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eltnLcyP8AU
Steve Munro Blog Post on TTC Board discussion on Line 6 Finch West LRT - https://stevemunro.ca/2025/12/10/ttc-board-debates-finch-lrt/
